parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Default value: 200.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resources from which you want to query tags. Set the value to DOMAIN.
